text_block_list.text: What, so just 'cause I'm small, Idon't even get a chance?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
An outburst of anger cuts through the<n>cafeteria's idle
lunchtime chatter.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The room is stunned silent... until a<n>whisper of voices begins
to buzz, and<n>students nervously turn their eyes to<n>the
offending table.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The student who shouted stands up,<n>hardly taller than when
she was<n>seated.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wh-whoa! Waaait, wait, wait! I didn't<n>mean it like that,
Taishin! I swear it's<n>not about your height!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ticket does make a valid point,<n>Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Sufficient nutrition is certainly<n>essential to physical growth,
but what<n>you have there is far more food than<n>you require.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Heaps of food lie on the table next to<n>Narita Taishin. There's
no way she'll<n>finish it all.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Who asked you...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Just listen, will you? I don't want a<n>repeat of how you ate
yourself sick<n>the other day. You're a naturally light<n>eater—

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I said, SHUT IT!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: T-Taishin! Come on, can't we just—

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Get away from me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: And quit nagging me. Just leave me<n>alone!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The scene leaves a bad aftertaste<n>that lingers in the back of
my mind.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On my way home from a long day's<n>work, I hear footsteps
from the<n>darkened training course.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant...
choice_data_list: (Someone's doing laps? At this time of night?)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Furiously running around the course<n>is the petit racer from
lunch today,<n>Narita Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Grrr... Raaagh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Through gritted teeth, she lets out an<n>agonized shout that
echoes<n>throughout the track.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The frustration—thedesperation—in her steps... It almost hurts to watch.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Several days later... runners line the<n>track for tryouts, eager
to show<n>trainers their hard-won skills.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For many of the determined athletes,<n>it represents the
chance of a lifetime<n>and the first step toward the big<n>
leagues.

text_block_list.name: Racer
text_block_list.text: Whoa!

text_block_list.name: Racer
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I didn't see you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Narita Taishin, barely visible, struggles<n>to stand out among
the many debut<n>hopefuls.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Yikes, look at that tiny one over there.<n>Hm... To be honest,
I'm not seeing<n>anyone promising.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Agreed. Usually we get at least one<n>from a good family, or
even just<n>someone with a nice, athletic build.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hey now. We won't really know<n>anything until we see them
run. Look,<n>they're about to start!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hmph... I'm gonna do this. They'll<n>finally see!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Here we go! The racers are lined up<n>at the starting gate...
And they're off!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Haaah!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Huh? That tiny kid's trying to get out<n>of the pack! She's not
gonna try and<n>push her way through to the front, is<n>she?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Mhm. But with that small frame of<n>hers...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I knew it. The middle's too much for<n>her. She's at a total
disadvantage<n>stature-wise.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Damn it!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Geez, the others are just brushing<n>her off... There's no way
she has<n>enough stamina to keep up.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The leaders have rounded the fourth<n>corner! But what's
this? A challenger<n>is fast approaching!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Aaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's Narita Taishin! Narita Taishin<n>rushes ahead with
tremendous speed!<n>She's going for the lead!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She wasted all her energy at the start.<n>What reckless
running... It hurts to<n>watch.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's no doubt her break for the<n>front was a sight to
behold. But in the<n>end, Narita Taishin slipped down in<n>
position... and finished in tenth.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: After the intense race...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... That sucked... Myhead is pounding.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Taishin, do you have a moment<n>to—oh dear, are you
okay? Still can't<n>catch your breath?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hm?! No, I'm fine. You need<n>something?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
No... That race told me everything. I<n>hate to say this, but...
You just aren't<n>built for racing. You should do<n>yourself a
favor and give up.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You're too small. If you pulled a stunt<n>like that in the Twinkle
Series, you<n>could get yourself seriously hurt.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
For your safety... Start looking into<n>other career paths. There
are plenty of<n>choices for Umamusume besides<n>racing.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: ...Buzz off.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Listen to me, Taishin! Please, I'm<n>saying this for your sake.
Would you<n>at least—

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Just shut up already! You're saying itfor my sake? Hah! What a load ofcrap!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'll show you all! I'm going to win if<n>it's the last thing I do!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Narita Taishin spits the words out and<n>runs off in a huff. The
crushed look in<n>her eyes as she passes me—it's<n>
heartbreaking.
